352110002711822338.Name: Cyrillus
352110002711822338.Career: Mage of the College of Winterhold
352110002711822338.Description: scrawny with golden eyes and light brown hair, wears dirty and worn mages robes, spends a lot of time in his castle. Doesn't usually use a weapon but he does have a staff of some form of conjuration magic
352110002711822338.WDescription: A small ruined tower, where Cyrillus spent the night, and the place where he first summoned Zahiri
